snippet: The president’s son-in-law and incoming national security adviser met with the ambassador, Sergey I. Kislyak, for 20 minutes at Trump Tower in December....

headline.main: U.S. Prosecutors Fight Ruling Limiting Foreign Bribery Cases
headline.print_headline: U.S. Prosecutors Fight Ruling Limiting Foreign Bribery Cases

lead_paragraph: The president’s son-in-law and incoming national security adviser met with the ambassador, Sergey I. Kislyak, for 20 minutes at Trump Tower in December.
